4 alarming ways cortisol affects your body—and what it's trying to tell you
description: Chronic high cortisol levels, the body's stress hormone, can lead to visible physical changes. These include facial and belly weight gain, premature aging and skin issues like acne and wrinkles, thinning hair, muscle wasting, and posture changes. Managing stress through exercise, sleep, and relaxation techniques is crucial for balancing these effects.

title: US government shutdown threatens Head Start funding and preschool places
description: The US government shutdown threatens federal funding for Head Start programmes, putting over 65,000 vulnerable preschool children at risk. Many centres have missed payments and are relying on reserves or local aid. If the shutdown continues, more closures will follow, affecting essential early education and support services for low-income families. The shutdown also impacts related assistance programmes like WIC and Medicaid, heightening challenges for thousands of families nationwide.

title: Watch: Indian-origin journalist teaches Andrew Cuomo correct pronunciation of Mamdani
description: During an MSNBC interview, former Governor Andrew Cuomo mispronounced mayoral candidate Zohran Mamdani's name as 'Mandami'. Journalist Anand Giridharadas corrected Cuomo, emphasizing the importance of respecting names in a diverse city. "First of all, governor, it's Mamdani. This is a very big, diverse city you want to lead. We should get the names right," Giridharadas said.

How Trump’s H-1B rule disrupts startups, AI talent & international workers’ futures
description: The Trump administration’s $100,000 H-1B visa fee is disrupting America’s tech ecosystem, hitting startups, small businesses, and AI-focused roles hardest. While aimed at protecting domestic workers, the policy is shrinking talent pools, slowing recruitment, and straining international workers. Companies are turning to upskilling and university partnerships, but short-term disruptions could undermine U.S. innovation and global competitiveness.

title: After going for AI agents, laying off 4K employees; Salesforce CEO says: AI doesn't have a soul

title: Fact Check: Adam Sandler Won’t Join Turning Point USA’s Super Bowl Event
description: A viral rumor claiming Adam Sandler would perform at Turning Point USA's halftime show has been debunked.  Misleading social media posts, amplified by manipulated graphics, falsely linked the comedian to Lara Trump's event.  Sources confirm Sandler remains focused on his comedy and film projects, with no political ties to the organization.

title: Who Are Auston Matthews’ Parents? Inside Maple Leafs Captain’s Family
description: Auston Matthews' journey to NHL stardom is deeply rooted in the unwavering support of his parents, Brian and Ema Matthews. Ema, a former flight attendant with a pilot's dream, instilled discipline and humility, while Brian, a former baseball pitcher, guided his son's athletic development. Their dedication nurtured his talent from Scottsdale to international stages.

title: Is Tez Johnson Bo Nix’s adopted brother? Know their NFL story
description: Bo Nix and Tez Johnson share a profound bond, rooted in family and adoption. Tez, facing early hardship, found stability with the Nix family, becoming Bo's adopted brother. This support fueled their shared journey through high school and college football. Now, both brothers have achieved NFL dreams, with Bo drafted by the Broncos and Tez signing with the Buccaneers.
